name: $socialEventData
description: Returns event data for any forgesocial events

name: $githubAddRunnerLabelsRepo
description: Adds custom labels to a self-hosted runner for a repository

args.description: The ID of the self-hosted runner

args.name: labels
args.description: Array of label names to add (comma-separated)

name: $githubApproveWorkflow
description: Approves a workflow run that is waiting for review

args.name: runId
args.description: The ID of the workflow run

name: $githubCancelWorkflowRun
description: Cancels a workflow run for a GitHub repository

args.name: runId
args.description: The ID of the workflow run

name: $githubDeleteArtifact
description: Deletes an artifact from a GitHub repository

args.name: artifactId
args.description: The ID of the artifact to delete

name: $githubDeleteWorkflowLogs
description: Deletes all logs for a workflow run

args.name: runId
args.description: The ID of the workflow run

name: $githubDispatchWorkflow
description: Dispatches a workflow run for a GitHub repository

args.name: workflowId
args.description: The ID or filename of the workflow, e.g., main.yml

args.name: ref
args.description: The git ref (branch or tag) to run the workflow on

args.name: inputs
args.description: Optional JSON string of inputs for the workflow run

name: $githubDownloadArtifact
description: Downloads an artifact for a GitHub repository

args.name: path
args.description: The path to save the artifact

name: $githubDownloadJobLogs
description: Downloads the logs for a specific job in a workflow run

args.name: page
args.description: Page number of the results to fetch

name: $githubDownloadWorkflowRunLogs
description: Downloads the logs for a workflow run

args.name: runId
args.description: The ID of the workflow run

name: $githubGetArtifact
description: Gets an artifact for a GitHub repository

name: $githubGetWorkflowJob
description: Gets a specific job from a workflow run

name: $githubGetWorkflowRun
description: Gets a workflow run for a GitHub repository

args.name: runId
args.description: The ID of the workflow run

args.name: excludePullRequests
args.description: Excludes pull requests from the list of runs.

name: $githubListArtifacts
description: Lists artifacts for a GitHub repository

args.name: artifactName
args.description: The name of the artifact. When provided, only artifacts with this name will be returned.

args.name: limit
args.description: The maximum number of artifacts to return.

args.name: page
args.description: The page of artifacts to return.

name: $githubListRunArtifacts
description: Lists artifacts for a workflow run

args.name: runId
args.description: The ID of the workflow run

args.name: page
args.description: Page number of the results to fetch

name: $githubListSelfHostedRunnersRepo
description: Lists all self-hosted runners for a repository

args.name: page
args.description: Page number of the results to fetch

name: $githubListWorkflowJobs
description: Lists jobs for a workflow run

args.name: runId
args.description: The ID of the workflow run

args.name: page
args.description: Page number of the results to fetch

name: $githubListWorkflowRuns
description: Lists workflow runs for a GitHub repository

args.name: workflowId
args.description: The ID of the workflow, you can also pass the workflow name such as main.yml

args.name: actor
args.description: Gets the workflow runs triggered by a specific user. Provide the username of the person who made the push that started the workflow.

args.name: branch
args.description: Gets the workflow runs triggered by a specific branch. Provide the name of the branch.

args.name: event
args.description: Gets the workflow runs triggered by a specific event. Provide the name of the event.

args.name: status
args.description: Filters workflow runs by their status or result. For example, you can get runs that are in_progress or that finished success. Only GitHub Actions can use waiting, pending, or requested as a status.

args.name: limit
args.description: The maximum number of runs to return.

args.name: page
args.description: The page of runs to return.

args.name: excludePullRequests
args.description: Excludes pull requests from the list of runs.

name: $githubRemoveRunnerLabelRepo
description: Removes a custom label from a self-hosted runner for a repository

args.name: runnerId
args.description: The ID of the self-hosted runner

args.name: name
args.description: The name of the label to remove

name: $githubRerunFailedJobs
description: Reruns all failed jobs in a workflow run

args.name: runId
args.description: The ID of the workflow run

args.name: enableDebugLogging
args.description: Whether to enable debug logging for the re-run

name: $githubRerunWorkflow
description: Reruns a workflow run for a GitHub repository

args.name: runId
args.description: The ID of the workflow run

name: $githubAddAssignees
description: Add assignees to an issue in a GitHub repository

args.name: assignees
args.description: Comma-separated list of assignees to add

name: $githubAddLabels
description: Add labels to an issue in a GitHub repository

args.name: labels
args.description: Comma-separated list of labels to add

name: $githubCreateComment
description: Create a comment on an issue or pull request

name: $githubCreateIssue
description: Create a new issue in a GitHub repository

args.name: assignees
args.description: Comma-separated list of usernames to assign

args.name: milestone
args.description: Milestone ID to associate the issue with

name: $githubDeleteComment
description: Delete a comment on an issue or pull request

args.name: comment_id
args.description: The ID of the comment to delete

name: $githubGetIssue
description: Get a specific issue from a GitHub repository

name: $githubListIssueComments
description: List comments on an issue

args.name: since
args.description: Only show notifications updated after the given time

args.name: page
args.description: Page number of the results to fetch

name: $githubListIssues
description: List issues in a GitHub repository

args.name: milestone
args.description: Milestone number, or * for issues with any milestone, or none for issues without milestones

args.name: state
args.description: State of the issues to return (open, closed, all)

args.name: assignee
args.description: Filter by assignee (username, * for assigned to any, none for no assignee)

args.name: sort
args.description: What to sort results by (created, updated, comments)

args.name: since
args.description: Only show notifications updated after the given time (ISO 8601 format)

name: $githubListMyIssues
description: Lists issues assigned to the authenticated user across all repositories

args.name: filter
args.description: Filter to determine which issues are returned (assigned, created, mentioned, subscribed, all)

args.name: state
args.description: State of the issues to return (open, closed, all)

args.name: labels
args.description: Comma-separated list of label names to filter by

args.name: sort
args.description: How to sort the results (created, updated, comments)

args.name: since
args.description: Only show notifications updated after the given time (ISO 8601 format)

args.name: page
args.description: Page number of the results to fetch

name: $githubRemoveAssignees
description: Remove assignees from a GitHub issue

args.name: assignees
args.description: Comma-separated list of usernames to remove as assignees

name: $githubRemoveLabel
description: Remove a label from an issue in a GitHub repository

description: Update a comment on an issue or pull request

args.description: The updated contents of the comment

name: $githubUpdateIssue
description: Update an existing issue in a GitHub repository

name: $githubCreateRelease
description: Creates a new release

args.description: Text describing the contents of the tag

name: $youtubeDownload
description: Downloads a YouTube video to a file.

args.name: path
args.description: The file path to save the video.

args.name: client
args.description: The client to use for downloading.

args.name: itag
args.description: The itag to get streaming data for.

args.name: quality
args.description: The quality to get streaming data for.

args.name: type
args.description: The type to get streaming data for.

args.name: language
args.description: The language to get streaming data for.

args.name: format
args.description: The format to get streaming data for.

args.name: codec
args.description: Video or audio codec identifier for the stream

description: Gets an attestation challenge for YouTube.

args.description: The ID of the video to retrieve information for.

description: Retrieves information about a YouTube video.

args.description: The ID of the video to retrieve information for.

name: $youtubeGetSearchSuggestions
description: Gets search suggestions.

args.name: query
args.description: The query to get search suggestions for.

args.name: previousQuery
args.description: The previous query to get search suggestions for.

name: $youtubeGetShortsVideoInfo
description: Retrieves information about a YouTube Shorts video.

args.name: videoId
args.description: The ID of the video to retrieve information for.

name: $youtubeGetStreamingData
description: Gets streaming data.

args.name: itag
args.description: Theitag to get streaming data for.

args.name: quality
args.description: The quality to get streaming data for.

args.name: type
args.description: The type to get streaming data for.

args.name: language
args.description: The language to get streaming data for.

args.name: format
args.description: The format to get streaming data for.

args.name: codec
args.description: Video or audio codec identifier for the stream

description: Resolves a URL.

name: $youtubeSearch
description: Searches YouTube.

args.name: uploadDate
args.description: The upload date to filter by.

args.name: sortBy
args.description: The sort by to filter by.

name: $listTrackedYoutubeChannels
description: Returns a list of all tracked YouTube channel IDs.

args.description: The channel ID to track (e.g. UC_x5XG1OV2P6uZZ5FSM9Ttw)

description: Stops tracking a previously tracked YouTube channel.

name: $extractVideoID
description: Extracts a YouTube video ID from a URL or string.
